text: This is a list of restaurateurs. A restaurateur is a person who opens and runs restaurants professionally. Although over time the term has come to describe any person who owns a restaurant, traditionally it refers to a highly skilled professional who is proficient in all aspects of the restaurant business. ==Restaurateurs== * Gastón Acurio * Vahid Bakhshi(vivo) * Pius Alibek Hermez * Alex Atala * Askar Baitassov * Eddie Blay * Marcel Boulestin * Norman E.
